New Records: LeBron James is the oldest player in NBA history to record back-to-back triple-doubles.
Key Match Events: The Lakers won by a score of 123-103 to improve to 6-4 in their first ten games.
They are also in the middle of a two-game winning streak.
Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers had a tough road trip where they went 1-4 in five games.
Post-Match Reflections: James is off to an excellent start to the 2024-25 season.
The four-time NBA Champion is averaging 23.7 points, 7.4 rebounds and 8.1 assists per contest while shooting 52.3% from the field and 47.1% from the three-point range in nine games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers had a perfect 5-0 on their home floor in Los Angeles.
The Raptors dropped to 2-9 in their first 11 games.
Others: LeBron James finished his night with 19 points, ten rebounds, 16 assists and one steal while shooting 6/14 from the field in 35 minutes of playing time.
